Soyabean_leaf_00006.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a slightly serrated edge. The leaf has a few small spots or discolorations, primarily on the upper left side. The petiole is thin and green, and it appears to be attached to the stem at a slight angle.

Soyabean_leaf_00005.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped or oval shape. The edges of the leaf are smooth, and there are no visible damages or spots on the surface. The veins are visible and are of a lighter green color. The petiole appears to be thin and is also green in color.

Soyabean_leaf_00001.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a somewhat oval shape. It has several spots or discolored areas, primarily on the upper surface. The edges of the leaf appear to be smooth. There are no visible damages, and the veins are not distinctly visible.
